refnamediv.refpurpose: Escape a string so it can safely be used in an sql-statement.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: dbx_escape_string returns the text, escaped where necessary (such as quotes, backslashes etc). It returns NULL on error.

example.title: dbx_escape_string example
example.programlisting:
<?php
$link   = dbx_connect(DBX_MYSQL, "localhost", "db", "username", "password")
    or die ("Could not connect");

$text = dbx_escape_string($link, "It\'s quoted and backslashed (\\).");
$result = dbx_query($link, "insert into tbl (txt) values ('".$text."')");
if ( $result == 0 ) {
    echo dbx_error ($link);
}
dbx_close ($link);
?>
